data.text: @tfeldsjsu Hey Tara, when it comes to showing students what to do with their mouths, here is a great resource with examples for not only the รฐ and ฮธ you mentioned but also for the many other sounds. Its got pictures and videos for each. https://t.co/8jRmqUfvON

(cont.) I've also noticed that when I step away to pull my mask down to show them my mouth formation when I make the "th" sound, (just like in the pic above) they then pull their masks down, and then it's a domino effect. #ling107s22
